displayName.value: Azure Security Benchmark - Platform Connectivity (Audit Mode)

assignmentDescription.value: Azure Security Benchmark v3 assigned to Platform Connectivity management group in audit-only mode. Focuses on network security, connectivity, and data protection controls for hub networks, firewalls, VPN gateways, and ExpressRoute circuits.
